text: Avaron Privacy Policy
Update date: May 30, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: Avaron is a registered address of our company [Company Name: Beijing Xinghe Times Information Technology Co., Ltd.: No. 128, West side of the Central Archives of Hot Spring Town, Haidian District, Haidian District, BeijingFor short, "We" or "Avaron") provide services with services.
label: Contact Information

text: In addition to the "Avaron Service Agreement", we will further stroke you through the "Avaron Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred to as "this policy") to explain that when we use Awaron, we collect, use, store, share, shareThe situation of personal information and the rights you enjoy, this policy is an important part of the Avaron Service Agreement.
Avaron knows the importance of personal information to you and will do its best to protect your personal information security and reliable.

We are committed to maintaining your trust in us, abiding by the following principles, and protecting your personal information: the principles of consistency and responsibility, the principle of clear purpose, the principle of minimal use of the principle, the principles of consent and consent, the principle of openness and transparency, and ensuring safety principles.
label: Data Security

text: At the same time, the Avaron platform promises that we will arrange the industry's mature security standards and take corresponding security measures to protect your personal information.
label: Data Security

text: Please read and understand this "Privacy Policy" before using our products.
If you use the products or services we provide, it means that you have fully understood and agreed to what we described in this policy.
label: Policy Change

text: This policy will help you understand the following:
1. How do we collect your personal information
2. How can we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
3. How do we protect your personal information
Fourth, your rights
Fifth, personal information of minors
6. Information storage
Seven, policy updates
8. How to contact us
1. How do we collect and use your personal information

Personal information refers to a variety of information that can identify specific natural persons or reflects the activity of specific natural persons in a single or other information with other information.
According to the principles of legal, correctness, and necessary, we collect and use your personal information in order to realize the following functions of this policy:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: (1) Meet the needs of network security guarantee and security risk control

In order to ensure your normal use of Awaron's basic functions and normal services, optimize the performance of game product product performance according to your device terminal and network status, improve your game experience and ensure your account security, meet network security guarantee and security risk control, cope withAnti -cheating, anti -fraud, illegal and bad information management and other security risks, we will collect your equipment model, operating system version number, and sole device recognition symbol (IMEI refers to a stream of characters that are inserted into the device by equipment manufacturers, which can be used for used for it for use for it.Identify the corresponding devices in a unique way), the international mobile user identification code (IMSI), the login IP address, the way of accessing the network, the type and status of the network, the network quality and data, the operation log, the service log, the MAC address of the device, the storage and telephone permissionsSoftware installation list information.
label: Data Security
Permission Acquisition
Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect equipment model, operating system version number, unique device recognition symbol, international mobile user identification code, login IP address, method of access network, type and status, network quality and data, operation logs, service logs, equipment MAC addresses, storage and storage and storage and storage and storage and storage and storage and storage and storage and storage and storage and storagePhone permissions, software installation list information to provide services and ensure security.

text: Please understand that this kind of information is the basis and necessary information that must be collected for services.
We will not store the information we store in the analysis software with any personal identity information you provided in the application.
(2) Registered account
1. When you register an account on the Awaron APP, you need to provide us with your account name and mobile phone number.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: Collecting this information is to help you complete the Avaron account registration and real -name authentication. After registration verification and you read and agree to this policy and user agreement, you will complete the account registration.Participate in games, send barrage, comments and other functions.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect your account name and mobile phone number to help you complete the Avaron account registration and real -name authentication.

text: If you do not agree with authorization or rejecting the above information, you can still browse on the Avaron platform as a tourist, but you will not be able to enjoy the functions and services of other registered users.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you do not provide an account name and mobile phone number, you can only browse as a tourist.

text: 2. When you register or log in to the product through a third -party account (WeChat, QQ, Weibo), you need to authorize us to obtain the public information (including avatars, nicknames, gender) of the third -party account you used for logging in, and bring the account numberBind to your product account.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: When registering and logging in with a third -party account, access and collect your personal information after your authorization, and bind it.

text: If you do not agree with authorization or rejecting the above information, you will not be able to register or log in to the product through a third -party account, but it will not affect other functions of your normal use of the product.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: If you refuse to provide information on a third -party account, you cannot register and log in with a third -party account.

text: 3. After completing the product account registration, you can decide whether to improve your avatar, nickname, gender, birthday, region, personalized signature and other account information.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: You can decide whether to improve your avatar, nickname, gender, birthday, region, personalized signature and other account information.

text: If you improve the above additional information, it will help us provide you with better services and experiences, but if you do not provide the above information, it will not affect the basic functions of the product.
(3) Real -name authentication user authentication

According to relevant national regulations, you need to complete the real -name identity certification. We will collect real identity information such as your name, ID number, etc. for account registration and login. This information is sensitive information. The collection of this information is to meet the relevant national regulations.Live publisher conducts authentication and use.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect real identity information such as your name, identity document number, etc. for authentication.

text: If you don't agree with us to collect the above information, you will not be able to complete the real -name authentication, nor can it be used on the Avaron platform to use our products and services or restricted.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: (4) Provide functions or services related to recharge consumption

When you use the consumption function of Awaron products, we will collect information such as your recharge records, consumption records, etc., so that you can check your transaction records and protect your virtual items to the greatest extent.
label: Data Security
First Party Collection Information

text: The above information is sensitive information, but the collection of the above information is necessary to realize the relevant functions, otherwise the transaction will not be completed.
(5) Realize personal dynamic sharing function

When you use comments, dynamics, and photo wall functions, the text, pictures, voice, short videos, and likes information you upload will be stored in our server because storage is necessary to achieve this function.
label: Data Retention
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: Collect and store the text, pictures, voice, short videos, likes, and like information you uploaded so that you can use comments, dynamics, and photo wall functions.

text: You can delete this information at any time.

Important

label: Third Party Sharing/ Disclosure
Important

text: (6) Provide personalized recommendations, display or push services and provide corresponding exit mechanisms

1. In order to provide you with personalized content display and push, and improve the user experience, we will collect and use your personal information to analyze and understand your partial number through automatic decision -making, so as to provide you with targeted content displayAnd push.

First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect and use personal information for automation decision analysis and understand your preferences.

Usage
rewrite: Personalized recommendations in this product will not identify the true identity of a specific natural person.

text: 2. You can always enter my-settings-open or cancel "personalized recommendation".
label: Important
Edit/Control

text: You need to show us that the location of the device is located so that we can recommend the game content or dynamics of the "city" users based on your geographical location, and make your game content or dynamics be presented on the "city" page.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information
Usage
rewrite: Collect the location information you voluntarily provide to recommend the game content or news of users in the same city, and display your game content or news.

text: The "City" channel will recommend users where the city is being played according to your real -time geographical location.
label: Important
Usage

label: Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: The location information of the device is refused to affected the realization of the "city" channel function, but it will not affect other functions.

text: (7) When you use this game product service, we will collect your game log information, such as logging in logs, operation information, game -to -game information, dating information, item logs, etc., so that you can use all types of games normallyRelated functions and scenarios are also used for customer service complaint processing and game security and loopholes.
label: Important
First Party Collection Information

text: Reading and storage permissions, dynamics, photography, viewing, real -name authentication, saving pictures, Weibo login, editing avatars

You can manage system permissions through the terminal device [Settings] page.

Edit/Control

text: 2. How can we share, transfer, and publicly disclose your personal information
(1) Sharing, you can share your relevant information with your friends, family and other users through our services.

text: Please note that this may include sensitive information such as your personal identity information and personal property information.

You can control the scope of your sharing information through the privacy settings in our service. You can also delete the information you shared publicly through the service settings or the guidelines we provide.
label: Important
Edit/Control

Risk

text: three.How do we protect your personal information
(1) We strive to provide guarantees for user information security to prevent information loss, improper use, unauthorized access or disclosure.
label: Data Security

text: We will use various security protection measures within a reasonable security level to ensure information security.
label: Data Security

text: For example, we will use encryption technology (for example, SSL), anonymous processing and other means to protect your personal information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Use encryption technology (for example, SSL), anonymous processing and other means to protect personal information.

text: We have continuously enhanced the security capabilities of software installed on your device through continuous improvement to prevent your personal information leakage.
label: Data Security

text: For example, we will complete some information encryption in your device for security transmission;
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Complete some information encryption in the device to transmit some information encryption.

text: To prevent viruses, Trojan programs or other malicious programs, websites, you will understand the application information installed by your device or the process information that is being running.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Understand the application information of the device or the processing information that is running to prevent viruses, Trojan programs or other malicious programs.

text: (2) We will take all reasonable and feasible measures to ensure unrelated personal information.
label: Data Security

text: We will only retain your personal information within the time limit required by the cost of reaching the cost of the cost, unless you need to extend the retention period or be permitted by law.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Reserves your personal information within the time limit required for the service purpose, unless the law has other requirements.

text: (3) The Internet is not an absolutely secure environment, and email, instant messaging, and communication methods with other Awaron users are not encrypted. We strongly recommend that you do not send personal information in this way.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: It is recommended that you do not send personal information through emails, instant messaging, and other non -encrypted methods.

text: Please use complex passwords to help us guarantee your account security.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Please use complex passwords to help us guarantee your account security.

text: (4) We establish a special management system, process and organization to ensure the security of information.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Establish a special management system, process and organization to ensure information security.

text: For example, we strictly restrict the scope of the personnel of access information and require them to obey the confidentiality obligations.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Strictly restrict the scope of the personnel of access information, and requires it to comply with confidentiality obligations.

text: (5) If security incidents such as personal information leakage occur, we will start emergency plans to prevent the expansion of security incidents. In accordance with the requirements of laws and regulations, inform you in a timely manner, letter, telephone, push notification, etc.And possible influence, we have taken the disposal measures that may be adopted, your advice that can prevent and reduce risks, remedy measures, etc.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Inform you in a timely manner that the basic situation and possible impact of safety events, handling measures that have been taken or will be adopted, suggestions that can prevent and reduce risks, and remedy measures.

text: Avaron passed the evaluation and filing of the national network security level protection (level 2), and has the corresponding data security and information protection capabilities.
label: Important
Data Security
rewrite: Avaron passed the evaluation and filing of the national network security level protection (level 2).

text: Four.Your rights
In accordance with China's relevant laws, regulations, standards, and the practice of other countries and regions, we guarantee that you exercise the following rights on your personal information:
label: Edit/Control

text: (1) Visit, modify and delete information
label: Edit/Control

text: You can access, modify and delete the registration information and other personal information in the process of using our service.

text: (3) How do we respond to your above request
label: Edit/Control

Data Security

text: Please understand that due to technical restrictions, laws or regulatory requirements, we may not be able to meet all your requirements, and we will answer your request within a reasonable period.
label: Important
Edit/Control
rewrite: If we cannot meet your requirements for accessing, modifying or deleting relevant information or accounts, you will reply to your request in a reasonable period.

text: At the same time, in accordance with relevant laws and regulations and national standards, in the following circumstances, we may not be able to respond to your request:
label: Important
Edit/Control

text: five.Personal information of minors
Our products, websites and services are mainly adults.
label: Important
rewrite: Our products, websites and services are mainly adults.

label: Specific Audiences
Important

label: Specific Audiences
Important

text: six.Information storage
In principle, the personal information we collected and generated in the territory of the People's Republic of China will be stored in the territory of the People's Republic of China.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: The personal information collected and generated in domestic operations will be stored in China.Except for the following situations: 1. Applicable laws have clear stipulation; 2. Get your clear authorization consent.

text: Except for the following situations:
label: Data Retention

text: 1. Applicable laws are clearly stipulated;
label: Data Retention

text: 2. Get your clear authorization consent.
label: Data Retention

text: We promise that the storage time of your personal information is always within a reasonable and necessary period.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: The storage time of personal information is always within a reasonable and necessary period.

text: For personal information beyond the period, we will delete or do anonymous processing.
label: Data Retention
Important
rewrite: Personal information exceeding the deadline is deleted or anonymous.

text: When our products or services stop operation, we will notify you in the form of push notifications and announcements, and delete your personal information or perform anonymous processing within a reasonable period.
label: Important
Cessation of Operations
rewrite: When the operation is stopped, the announcement will be announced in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, and personal information will be deleted or anonymous.

text: seven.Policy update
We may revise this guidelines in a timely manner.
When the guidelines are changed, we will show you the changes in the form of push notifications and pop -ups when you log in and update.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: After the privacy policy is updated, you will show you the change of privacy policy after login and version update.

text: Please note that only after you click the consent button in the pop -up window, we will collect, use, and store your personal information according to the updated guidelines.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: Only after you click the consent button in the pop -up window, will we collect, use, and store your personal information according to the updated guidelines.
